text: Yamalheke yayo, nkakaaweha, nkakoona nlhoko mulhupalhe wa attu ahinooria waalhakelhiya, attu aakhuma kila nikosho ni o kila ilhapo ni o kila nihimo ni o kila nulhumo. Ni ayo yaari aneemenlhe mmiholho ihiche yo imwene ni mmiholho mwa Mwaana o Khondoro, anawanre ikuwo cho uteelha ni uvara maphumbulhu o mitende mmathathani mwaya.
